title: Start
body:
Cow: Hello! Can you share some cookies?
[[Yes|GiveCookieScenario]]
[[No|MyCookieScenario]]

title: MyCookieScenario
body:
Cow: Can I buy the cookie from you? ðŸ˜‰
[[Yes|CookieBought]]
[[No|CookieNotBought]]

title: CookieBought
body:
<<set $money to 1>>
Cow: Thank you!
<<set $cow_friendship = 1>>
Cow: Yay!
[[Continue|BuySomething]]

title: BuySomething
body:
<<set $apples=1>>
You have [plural {$apples} one="an apple" other="% apples"]
Now, I have {$money}!
<<if $money > 1>>
	I would like a horse please.
	<<set $money to $money - 2>>
	<<set $hasHorse to true>>
<<elseif $money eq 1 >>
	Just a drink thanks.
	<<set $money to $money - 1>>
<<else>>
	Drat, I can't afford anything.
<<endif>>
